001
002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
005
006import com.commercetools.api.models.Versioned;
007import com.commercetools.api.models.product.Product;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.product.ProductDraft;
009import com.commercetools.api.models.product.ProductDraftBuilder;
010import com.commercetools.api.models.product.ProductUpdate;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.product.ProductUpdateAction;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.product.ProductUpdateActionBuilder;
013
014public interface ByProjectKeyProductsRequestBuilderMixin {
015    public ByProjectKeyProductsPost post(ProductDraft productDraft);
016
017    public ByProjectKeyProductsByIDRequestBuilder withId(String ID);
018
019    public default ByProjectKeyProductsByIDPost update(Versioned<Product> product,
020            java.util.List<ProductUpdateAction> actions) {
021        return withId(product.getId())
022                .post(builder -> ProductUpdate.builder().version(product.getVersion()).actions(actions));
023    }
024
025    public default ByProjectKeyProductsByIDPost update(Versioned<Product> product,
026            UnaryOperator<UpdateActionBuilder<ProductUpdateAction, ProductUpdateActionBuilder>> op) {
027        return withId(product.getId()).post(builder -> ProductUpdate.builder()
028                .version(product.getVersion())
029                .actions(op.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(ProductUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
030    }
031
032    public default WithUpdateActionBuilder<ProductUpdateAction, ProductUpdateActionBuilder, ByProjectKeyProductsByIDPost> update(
033            Versioned<Product> product) {
034        return builder -> withId(product.getId()).post(b -> ProductUpdate.builder()
035                .version(product.getVersion())
036                .actions(builder.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(ProductUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
037    }
038
039    public default ByProjectKeyProductsByIDDelete delete(Versioned<Product> product) {
040        return withId(product.getId()).delete().withVersion(product.getVersion());
041    }
042
043    public default ByProjectKeyProductsPost create(ProductDraft productDraft) {
044        return post(productDraft);
045    }
046
047    public default ByProjectKeyProductsPost create(UnaryOperator<ProductDraftBuilder> op) {
048        return post(op.apply(ProductDraftBuilder.of()).build());
049    }
050}
